.... This movie is about a group of people who decide to make a trip to the edge of the world and stop at a remote part of Mexico where they meet up with one of their buddies. Unfortunately, they are attacked by an evil spirit that kidnaps them and kills all of them. In order to save their friends, the group decides to travel back in time to a time when they first met the spirits. When they arrive at the time, however, there are a lot of problems. First, unlike most movies, this movie doesn't take itself too seriously. Sure, it has some great special effects, but it isn't as good as most films out there.
